1572696653_1HvReABeo2mV6ZTQiUJhcmpzrxd4F.body:
Catalonia has always been a land of understanding and convergence, from the Jews in the Middle Ages until now exiled Republicans ... if the old Spanish customs and their occupation forces arrive and make this land like any other (we have ours own signs of identity), this land will no longer be worth anything!
They just do not have the rights to convert us
